meaningMnemonic: You use a special <radical>spear</radical> in <radical>winter</radical> to give yourself the <radical>power</radical> to do all of your <kanji>task</kanji>s.
readingMnemonic: Your <kanji>task</kanji> is to spear this cow. "<reading>Moo</reading> (む)!" it yells at you and runs away. You need to make dinner though... that's your task, so you better catch up to that cow and put an end to its mooing.
